title: 4.20 FPS Drop
body:
Ever since the new patch came out I have been experiencing major FPS drop issues on my Mac client. I have a Macbook Pro 2010 and have only had minor issues until this patch. Is anyone else experiencing/has anyone else experienced this and have any solutions? I have tried restarting my computer, resetting the P RAM, and checking on Activity Monitor to see if anything is taking up major CPU% but have found nothing. Help a brotha out! 

Also, I'm not super tech savvy like I used to be so bear with me if I don't understand your vernacular.

replies.body: Yes I have. For a while.
